section.title: Changing Default Jobs
section.para: The procedure to make changes to jobs created by default in &kw-hos; is to edit the model file, my_cloud/config/freezer/jobs.yml and then re-run the _freezer-manage-jobs.yml playbook. (Note that the backup/restore component is called "Freezer" so you may see commands by that name.)
